channel.title: 711 client doesnt load cache
channel.description:
ok what i do ,
1/ i start the client
2/ client creates a directory
3/ i put the cache from my server source in the client directory
4/ i restard the client
5/ and its stuck at 1%
i'm using the matrix new client 667 , NRS3scape cache to play the NRS3 source.
please help, thanks in advance.

item.title: 711 client doesnt load cache
item.dc:creator: @Furioz Furioz
item.description:
@Furioz wrote:

i changed the ip to the server ip , but ur client needs to load a cache to right. thats why all clients have a cachedownloader , cause ur client uses a cache to . now my problem is that i dont have the correct cache for my client.

Read full topic

item.title: 711 client doesnt load cache
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

dude go back to 317’s…

Cache doesnt load from the client it loads from the source, put the cache in your Data Folder in your source, make sure you change the ip’s in the client in your loader class.

Good Luck, if you cant do that your not gonna get far with matrix.

Read full topic
